# This file has been generated by the add_job script
math(EXPR NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM "${NUM_OUT_RECORDS}" OUTPUT_FORMAT DECIMAL)
math(EXPR NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS_NUM "${NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS}" OUTPUT_FORMAT DECIMAL)
if (NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS_NUM GREATER NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM) 
  set(NUM_OBJ "${NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS}")
else()
  set(NUM_OBJ "${NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM}")
endif()    
set(UNROLL_BOUND "${NUM_OBJ}")
add_library(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness STATIC
  ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness.c)
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness PRIVATE MBEDTLS_SSL_VARIABLE_BUFFER_LENGTH)
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness PRIVATE NUM_OUT_RECORDS=${NUM_OUT_RECORDS})
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness PRIVATE NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS=${NUM_FLIGHT_APPEND_OPS})
target_include_directories(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness
  PRIVATE ${MBEDTLS_DIR}/include/
  ${MBEDTLS_DIR}/library/
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/seahorn/include/
  ${SEAMOCK_ROOT}/include)
sea_link_libraries(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness ssl_mod_shadow_msg.opt.ir)
sea_link_libraries(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness seahorn_mbedtls_util_lib.ir)
sea_overlink_libraries(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_env.ir)
configure_file(sea.yaml sea.yaml @ONLY)
sea_attach_bc(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness)
sea_add_unsat_test(ssl_msg_flight_append_shadow_harness)
